channel.title: Smoke Alarms on Lanturn Weekly

item.title: Lanturn Glow - April 16, 2025
item.description: After the Ohio fire, this glow roots safety in purpose. Test your smoke alarms and donate to local pantries with a clear 'why'—like protecting your block. Write your reason to fuel action and share it to spark collective strength.

This week's digest tackles a global flu spike, an Ohio factory fire, and tech layoffs. We uncover shared stakes—health, safety, opportunity—and offer actionable steps like getting vaccinated, testing smoke alarms, and upskilling. Join us to build a stronger tomorrow, together.
